text: Robert Frederick Jane (18 December 1929 â€“ 28 September 2018) was an Australian race car driver and businessman. He won the Armstrong 500 four times, the race that became the famous Bathurst 1000, and was a four-time Australian Touring Car Champion. He later founded the successful tyre retailer, Bob Jane T-Marts. He was born in Melbourne, Victoria. Jane died after a 21-year struggle with prostate cancer on 28 September 2018. He was 88. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Australian businesspeople Category:Australian racecar drivers Category:Cancer deaths in Australia Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Sportspeople from Melbourne
title: Bob Jane
